questions.q: What is a Type Error in JavaScript?

choices.a: An error thrown when parentheses are unbalanced
choices.b: An error thrown when we use a function that hasn't been defined
choices.c: An error thrown when we use a incorrect CSS Selector for jQuery
choices.d: An error thrown when a data type is used incorrectly

questions.q: What Dev Tools tab allows us to "step" through code?
